name: Useless Slime Boss
description:
Hello there friends, in this little game you will play as an adorable little slime. And although it might be useless on it's own, it has a secret up his sleeve.

This game was made for VimJam2. The Requirement was "Boss" and the  theme is on the edge.

I wanted to make a game where you play as the other side from a boss battle. So instead of having levels and power ups , you get "phases", if you drop below 0 hp, instead of dying you change phases, upgrading your abilities and stats. But don't overdo it, boss die too eventually.

For the theme, I've created a mechanic that allows you to absorb enemy abilities if you get really close to their attacks.

This is my first complete game so any feedback is heavily appreciated. 

Thank you for play and good luck!
